data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Bangka Belitung, Indonesia need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Bangka Belitung, Indonesia
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Over 88.73 percent of the people of Bangka Belitung are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!
Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 1,133,007 who are far from you in Bangka Belitung, Indonesia from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Bangka Belitung, Indonesia that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Belitung people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Bangka Belitung, Indonesia.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Bangka Belitung. Through your servants plant 255 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Bangka Belitung, Indonesia to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

location.name: Bangka Belitung
location.cities_list: Pangkalpinang, Sungailiat, Tanjung Pandan, Manggar, Muntok
location.cities_list_w_pop: Pangkalpinang (125,933), Sungailiat (74,719), Tanjung Pandan (62,374), Manggar (34,520), Muntok (26,709)
